short_summary: Department of Fisheries and Oceans requires Twenty-Seven (27) Boat Trailer for a 16'u2019 Aluminum Vessel
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking tenderers interested in bid on a request for quotation to procure the following: 27 boat trailers for 16-foot aluminum vessels. The trailers must be compliant with relevant vessel and mooring regulations.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
===============

**Boat Trailer Request for Proposal (RFP)**

**Project Reference:** WS4443459609-Doc4443636720; Solicitation Number: WS4443459609

**Summary:**
---------------

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of twenty-seven (27) boat trailers for use with 16-foot aluminum vessels.

**Project Description:**
------------------------

The DFO is seeking to acquire twenty-seven (27) boat trailers to support the operations of its marine fleet. The trailers must be compatible with 16-foot aluminum vessels and meet specific requirements outlined in the bid documents.

**Tender Details:**
-----------------

*   Tender Closing: March 11, 2024, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
*   Expected Contract Start Date: March 14, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: February 7, 2025
*   Regions of Delivery: Canada
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Bid Documents:**
-------------------

The RFP document, including technical specifications and requirements, is available on the Ariba Discovery website at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18813469][1].

**Contracting Entity:**
------------------------

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**

For inquiries, please email [stephanie.way@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca][2].

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

[1]: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18813469?extsite=MTg4MTM0NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
[2]: mailto:stephanie.way@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
